name: ORAU
0:
”Alexa, open ORAU”
”Alexa, ask ORAU what are your hours?”
”Alexa, ask ORAU what is your address?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: o. r. a. u.
des: ORAU provides innovative scientific and technical solutions to advance national priorities in science, education, security and health. Through specialized teams of experts, unique laboratory capabilities and access to a consortium of more than 120 major Ph.D.-granting institutions, ORAU works with federal, state, local and commercial customers to advance national priorities and serve the public interest. A 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation and federal contractor, ORAU manages the Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education (ORISE) for the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE). Learn more about ORAU at www.orau.org.
